page.title: 12MANOR HOUSE
page.content: The Parochial Church Council have appointed a village warden who walks round once a week picking up rubbish and keeping the village tidy. A village trail starts at the village church,and follows round to important places in the village. The oldest house in the village is a late Elizabethan Manor House.The front was restyled in the Georgian Times. There are huge cellars underneath in which prisoners stayed during a heavy snowstorm,during the war between the Parliamentarians and Royalists.The triumphant troops were leading their Royalist Prisoners back to Dorchester Prison when they were halted by the snow. Mr. and Mrs.Teychenne now live there. Mr.Teychenne is a sculptor and some of his work can be seen in the church.
